column4: I'm installing Ubuntu on a fresh hard drive. I want to set up encrypted LVM, but inside that I'd like to have separate /home and root partitions. Is this possible from the Alternate Install CD?
lvm with separate /home and root is possible iirc. I'm not sure about the encryption bit.
It seems that encrypted LVM doesn't allow further partitioning.
I have zero experience with encrypted lvm (or encrypted partitions for that matter)
